rfc2110_attachment

void rfc2110_attachment ( $content, $type, [$encoding = 0], [$contentid = 0] )

Create attachment
Function Parameters:
- string $content: Data to attach.
- string $type: MIME type of the data.
- string $encoding: Encoding type.
- string $contentid: Content-ID
Function Info:
